contractAnalysis.name: LiveDemoContract
storageCollisions: Contract may not be diamond storage compliant - consider using diamond storage pattern

facets.name: AdminFacet
facets.description: Administrative and ownership functions for secure access control
facets.reasoning: Isolated administrative functions for enhanced security, emergency controls, and governance. Critical for PayRox system integrity.

facets.name: ViewFacet
facets.description: Read-only functions optimized for gas-efficient queries
facets.reasoning: Grouped view functions reduce gas costs for read operations and enable efficient caching strategies.

facets.name: CoreFacet
facets.description: Core business logic  - Primary contract functionality
facets.reasoning: Core business logic separated for modularity, maintainability, and efficient PayRox routing.

warnings: ⚠️ High total gas estimate - consider further optimization

recommendations: 🔷 Implement diamond storage pattern for all facets to ensure isolation
🛡️ Ensure complete facet storage isolation for security
🔐 Implement role-based access control for storage operations
🚀 Use CREATE2 deterministic deployment for predictable storage layout
📋 Generate manifest with storage layout verification
🔍 Implement Merkle proof verification for storage integrity
gasOptimizations: 💎 Optimize diamond storage access patterns for gas efficiency
🎯 Use storage pointers to reduce SLOAD operations
🚀 Leverage CREATE2 for deterministic storage layout optimization
📋 Use manifest-based routing to minimize storage access overhead
🔍 Implement lazy loading for large storage structures
🔗 Consolidate shared storage operations to reduce cross-facet calls

simulationResults.name: CREATE2 Deployment: AdminFacet
simulationResults.description: Simulate deterministic deployment of AdminFacet facet
recommendations: Large number of functions - ensure proper categorization
Deployment follows PayRox Go Beyond deterministic pattern
Facet ready for manifest-based routing integration

simulationResults.name: CREATE2 Deployment: ViewFacet

recommendations: Deployment follows PayRox Go Beyond deterministic pattern

simulationResults.name: CREATE2 Deployment: CoreFacet

recommendations: Deployment follows PayRox Go Beyond deterministic pattern

simulationResults.name: Manifest-Based Routing Setup
recommendations: Routes successfully configured for PayRox Go Beyond dispatcher
Merkle tree verification enabled for all route updates
EXTCODEHASH validation active on function calls

simulationResults.name: Facet Storage Isolation
simulationResults.description: Verify isolated storage between facets (non-diamond pattern)
recommendations: Storage isolation properly implemented
No conflicts detected between facets

steps.name: Diamond-Safe Verification
steps.result: All facets use diamond-safe storage slots

simulationResults.name: Emergency Response Simulation
simulationResults.description: Test emergency controls and incident response
recommendations: Emergency controls functional and accessible
Route removal capability verified
System recovery procedures validated

techniques.name: Diamond Storage
techniques.description: Use diamond storage pattern for efficient storage access

recommendations: 💎 Optimize diamond storage access patterns for gas efficiency
🎯 Use storage pointers to reduce SLOAD operations
🚀 Leverage CREATE2 for deterministic storage layout optimization
📋 Use manifest-based routing to minimize storage access overhead
🔍 Implement lazy loading for large storage structures
🔗 Consolidate shared storage operations to reduce cross-facet calls
